products.name: Fresh Foam Hierro V8 - Sneakers
products.brandedName: New Balance Fresh Foam Hierro V8 - Sneakers
products.description: People love the idea of outdoor adventure, but the natural landscape is not just about fresh air and scenery. Uneven terrain, debris and moisture pose unique challenges for footwear that require special construction. For those who want to literally go off the beaten track, there's the Fresh Foam X Hierro, a dedicated off-road application of our best running technology. The Fresh Foam X Hierro v 8 uses a Vibram® Eco-Step Natural outsole to create a protective shell of durability and traction around the signature Fresh Foam X cushioning and a lightweight, breathable upper. - The Fresh Foam X midsole, with approximately 40% organic materials, offers our ultimate 'Fresh Foam experience' for incredible comfort. The organic materials are sourced from renewable resources to help reduce the C 02 footprint. - The Vibram® Eco-Step Natural sole offers superior grip and is made from over 90% petroleum-free ingredients. Vibram® is a registered trademark of VIBRAM S. p. A. All rights reserved. - Micro-Traction Lug by Vibram®. Vibram® is a registered trademark of VIBRAM S. p. A. All rights reserved. - The upper features a breathable and protected structure 318 grams DESIGNER ID: MTHIE RY 8 Composition: Upper: Fibres and Other Materials Linin Fibres and Other Materials Sole: Vibram® Eco-Step Natural

products.name: Men's Nike Cortez TXT Casual Shoes
products.brandedName: Nike Men's Cortez TXT Casual Shoes
products.description: . Revamped Nike Cortez design with contemporary updates and retro appeal. Re-engineered upper with durable nylon and suede to help prevent warping, creasing and scuffing. Nike Swoosh on the lateral and medial with Nike branding on the tongue and heel. Wider toe box and a padded collar supply a more comfortable fit. Firmer side panels help keep your foot in place for a more stable feel. Foam midsole with iconic wedge insert provides all-day comfort. Herringbone outsole pattern pairs durable traction and heritage style. The Nike Cortez TXT Casual Shoes are imported. Back and better than ever, the Men's Nike Cortez TXT Casual Shoes modernize an archival favorite for an ultra fresh and super comfortable update on an icon. Based on feedback, the Cortez TXT boasts a re-engineered upper and tweaks to the toe area and side panels to accommodate for a better fit while maintaining the classic silhouette and crisp aesthetic that made the Cortez iconic.

products.brandedName: Acne Studios Leather Zip Jacket in Burgundy
products.description: Acne Studios Leather Zip Jacket in Burgundy Self: 100% lamb leather Lining: 100% polyester. Made in Turkey. Professional leather clean only. Front zipper closure. Side slant zipper pockets. Single interior slip pocket. Midweight leather fabric. ACNE-MO211. B70138. About the designer: Acne Studios is a Stockholm-based fashion house with a multidisciplinary approach. Through founder and Creative Director Jonny Johansson’s interest in photography, art, architecture and contemporary culture, an alternative path has been found, turning Acne Studios into a well-respected creator of ready-to-wear, magazines, furniture, books and exhibitions. The collections are defined by Jonny Johansson’s signature juxtaposing design and attention to detail, with an emphasis on tailoring and an eclectic use of materials and custom-developed fabrics. The collections cover men’s and women’s ready-to-wear, footwear, accessories and denim.

products.name: Amiri Embroidered Hummingbird Crew in Blue
products.brandedName: Amiri Embroidered Hummingbird Crew in Blue
products.description: Amiri Embroidered Hummingbird Crew in Blue 85% cotton 15% cashmere. Made in Italy. Hand wash. Front Amiri logo. Ribbed trim. Lightweight knit fabric. AMIF-MK171. AMKNCW1008. About the designer: Mike Amiri's eponymous label fuses rock and roll with haute couture. Deriving its inspiration from Amiri's upbringing in Hollywood, the California-contemporary brand is handmade in LA and worn by A-listers who appreciate its one-of-a-kind nature: think hand-painted leather, Swarovski crystal-embellished denim, and cashmere distressed with bullet holes. Amiri began his career crafting stage pieces for iconic musicians like Axl Rose and Steven Tyler, and to this day his house continues to evoke the glam and exuberance of the golden era of rock. Amiri is for forward-thinkers who crave remarkable pieces that blend LA swagger with exceptional savoir-faire.

products.name: On Men's Cloudhorizon (Alloy/Frost) Men's Shoes
products.description: The primary materials that compose this product contain a minimum of 20 percent recycled content. Take on adventures and explorations with enhanced comfort and support wearing On Cloudhorizon Sneakers that offer a soft rolling motion and smooth ride on moderate terrain. The sneakers are designed with a soft engineered mesh made with recycled polyester for lightweight comfort and flexibility, recycled polyester lining, and a removable ethylene vinyl acetate cushioned insole. While the pull tabs on the tongue and ankle allow easy donning doffing, the lace-up closure offers easy adjustability. We recommend ordering a half size smaller. Round toe shape. Helion superfoam midsole. Missiongrip rubber outsole. Imported. Please note that ONLY the On Cloud 50/50, Cloud 70/30, Cloud Terry, and Cloud running shoes feature an extra pair of conventional laces, along with the On Cloud easy-entry speedlaces. Measurements: Weight: 11 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
